txt.en:
Orcs and Uruk-hai have snuck in behind the main defence and are trying to weaken the gate at Helm's Dike. Defend the barricades and the gate itself from the Orc Bombers. Scouts have also heard vague reports of an unusually large Uruk-hai in the area.

Merit Rating

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>Full</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#FF0000>Major Point Loss</rgb>
* Rohirrim soldier defeated
* Rohirrim commander defeated
* Barricade destroyed

<rgb=#FF0000>Moderate Point Loss</rgb>
* Gate weakened from Powder Keg explosion
The gate has sustained too much damage from the Orc Bombers
Stop the Orc bombers from destroying the gate-house.
<rgb=#FF0000>Do not allow the gate to be weakened by black powder kegs ([placeholder]/6)</rgb>
Defeat all waves of bombers and their leaders
[placeholder] Black Powder Kegs Detonated at Gate
